node.title: Man shot by police near Invercargill
node.description: A man is undergoing surgery in hospital after he was shot by police on State Highway 1 at Dacre, north of Invercargill.
node.content:
["A man is undergoing surgery in hospital after he was shot by police on State Highway 1 at Dacre, north of Invercargill.", "", "
\nPhoto: 123rf.com\n
", "Police said they were seeking the man after an earlier call of concern for a female.", "He was found by police shortly before midday and shot after he pointed a weapon at them.", "He was taken to hospital in a serious condition where he is undergoing surgery.", "Police said State Highway 1 is closed between Kerr Road and SH 98 while they conduct a scene examination.", "Motorists have been asked to avoid the area."]
